query.description: 0: pending, 1: approved, 2: rejected, 3: expired, 4: filled, 6: published, Please Note: 5 is set for draft status. Don't use that.
0: pending, 1: approved, 2: rejected, 3: expired, 4: filled, 6: published, Please Note: 5 is set for draft status. Don't use that.
